title: Website Launch
description: The early-stage WRIS website has been launched. Several features are planned but not yet implemented. Current efforts focus on building awareness while developing clearer guidance for prospective members.

title: Official Guide Development Underway
description: Development has begun on the official WRIS guide. It will document the organizationâ€™s purpose, operating principles, member expectations, and representative work outputs. An extended internal edition is also in progress to formalize internal processes and operations.
